name: Bay of Pigs
description:
Having lost your all your booty, your crew have mutinied and taken over the ship. Cast ashore, you must find enough loot to buy back both your boat and the affection of your shipmates.

Scavange for loose change around the island, or help some of the local inhabitants to reveal the location of buried treasure.

Every map is procedurally-generated, so no two games are the same.
